releaseNotes: Enhanced Celebration Experience - Completely redesigned fireworks with realistic physics and multiple explosions per firework - Added trailing particle effects to rising fireworks for authentic rocket appearance - Enhanced particle visuals with multi-layered glow effects, highlights, and dynamic sizing - Improved fireworks positioning and centering for better screen coverage - Enhanced balloon strings with longer, curlier design pointing in opposite direction - Fixed celebration positioning to display closer to congratulations text - Added realistic physics including gravity, air resistance, wind effects, and particle lifecycles - Multiple explosion patterns including spiral, starburst, and random scatter effects - Improved celebration animations with longer-lasting, more visually impressive displays
